title: Death of journalist Sunil Madhava Premathilaka
content: Senior Sinhala-language journalist Sunil Madhava Premathilaka passed away last night (23), aged 77.One of his most popular works was the in the style of ‘the diary of a truth-seeker.’A son of Meemana Premathilaka, a great poet of the Colombo Era, he was recently awarded the ‘Kalabhushana’ state award.
